title: Cardi B and 2 Chainz interview
itunes:title: Cardi B and 2 Chainz interview
description:
Today on the show we had friend to the show Cardi B call in, and they had a lot to catch up on and discuss, such as mommy life during the quarantine, new music, QC label and more. Also, we had 2 Chainz call in to discuss the verzuz battle with Rick Ross and promote his new song. Moreover, Charlamagne gave "Donkey of the Day" to North Paulding Highschool for not mandating wearing masks for students.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
